author: TravisEz13
body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/7586/files/5dc1e99f5deaf7a96f3cc7b586ebbd0847b04cbb#diff-577075ee8ff8aef572089b8912670b93R813

Because the content is being filtered based on having the header, message continuation lines are removed and later the `builder` cannot build the messages
title: Some codepaths in PSSysLog.psm1 don't return the entire log
